EmailTemplate.name: Co-app signature needed
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Loan Contract is about to expire!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey (CUSTOMER NAME),
You're halfway there!
Thank you for signing your BlueWave Solar Loan Contract. Before your contract can be finalized, we need your co-applicant/co-signer to sign his/her contract as well.
Please note if your co-applicant/co-signer doesn't sign within 3 days of you signing, your contract will expire.
To prevent this from happening, please remind your co-applicant/co-signer to sign his/her contract.
If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Care Team at (844) 786-4100.
- Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.768.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
